entrySource.description:
jobs table with job titles and salary ranges.
References with employees and job_history table.

fields.name: JOB_ID
fields.description: Primary key of jobs table.

fields.name: JOB_TITLE
fields.description: A not null column that shows job title, e.g. AD_VP, FI_ACCOUNTANT

fields.name: MIN_SALARY
fields.description: Minimum salary for a job title.

fields.name: MAX_SALARY
fields.description: Maximum salary for a job title

entrySource.description: country table. References with locations table.

fields.name: COUNTRY_ID
fields.description: Primary key of countries table.

fields.name: COUNTRY_NAME
fields.description: Country name

fields.name: REGION_ID
fields.description: Region ID for the country. Foreign key to region_id column in the departments table.

entrySource.description:
Table that stores job history of the employees. If an employee
changes departments within the job or changes jobs within the department,
new rows get inserted into this table with old job information of the
employee. Contains a complex primary key: employee_id+start_date.
References with jobs, employees, and departments tables.

fields.name: EMPLOYEE_ID
fields.description:
A not null column in the complex primary key employee_id+start_date.
Foreign key to employee_id column of the employee table

fields.name: START_DATE
fields.description:
A not null column in the complex primary key employee_id+start_date.
Must be less than the end_date of the job_history table. (enforced by
constraint jhist_date_interval)

fields.name: END_DATE
fields.description:
Last day of the employee in this job role. A not null column. Must be
greater than the start_date of the job_history table.
(enforced by constraint jhist_date_interval)

fields.name: JOB_ID
fields.description:
Job role in which the employee worked in the past; foreign key to
job_id column in the jobs table. A not null column.

fields.name: DEPARTMENT_ID
fields.description: Department id in which the employee worked in the past; foreign key to deparment_id column in the departments table

entrySource.description:
Locations table that contains specific address of a specific office,
warehouse, and/or production site of a company. Does not store addresses /
locations of customers. references with the departments and countries tables.

fields.name: LOCATION_ID
fields.description: Primary key of locations table

fields.name: STREET_ADDRESS
fields.description:
Street address of an office, warehouse, or production site of a company.
Contains building number and street name

fields.name: POSTAL_CODE
fields.description:
Postal code of the location of an office, warehouse, or production site
of a company.

fields.name: CITY
fields.description:
A not null column that shows city where an office, warehouse, or
production site of a company is located.

fields.name: STATE_PROVINCE
fields.description:
State or Province where an office, warehouse, or production site of a
company is located.

fields.name: COUNTRY_ID
fields.description:
Country where an office, warehouse, or production site of a company is
located. Foreign key to country_id column of the countries table.

entrySource.description: Regions table that contains region numbers and names. references with the Countries table.

fields.name: REGION_NAME
fields.description: Names of regions. Locations are in the countries of these regions.

fields.name: REGION_ID
fields.description: Primary key of regions table.

entrySource.description:
employees table. References with departments,
jobs, job_history tables. Contains a self reference.

fields.name: EMPLOYEE_ID
fields.description: Primary key of employees table.

fields.name: FIRST_NAME
fields.description: First name of the employee. A not null column.

fields.name: LAST_NAME
fields.description: Last name of the employee. A not null column.

fields.name: EMAIL
fields.description: Email id of the employee

fields.name: PHONE_NUMBER
fields.description: Phone number of the employee; includes country code and area code

fields.name: HIRE_DATE
fields.description: Date when the employee started on this job. A not null column.

fields.name: JOB_ID
fields.description:
Current job of the employee; foreign key to job_id column of the
jobs table. A not null column.

fields.name: SALARY
fields.description:
Monthly salary of the employee. Must be greater
than zero (enforced by constraint emp_salary_min)

fields.name: COMMISSION_PCT
fields.description:
Commission percentage of the employee; Only employees in sales
department elgible for commission percentage

fields.name: MANAGER_ID
fields.description:
Manager id of the employee; has same domain as manager_id in
departments table. Foreign key to employee_id column of employees table.
(useful for reflexive joins and CONNECT BY query)

fields.name: DEPARTMENT_ID
fields.description:
Department id where employee works; foreign key to department_id
column of the departments table

entrySource.description:
Departments table that shows details of departments where employees
work. references with locations, employees, and job_history tables.

fields.name: DEPARTMENT_ID
fields.description: Primary key column of departments table.

fields.name: DEPARTMENT_NAME
fields.description:
A not null column that shows name of a department. Administration,
Marketing, Purchasing, Human Resources, Shipping, IT, Executive, Public
Relations, Sales, Finance, and Accounting.

fields.name: MANAGER_ID
fields.description: Manager_id of a department. Foreign key to employee_id column of employees table. The manager_id column of the employee table references this column.

fields.name: LOCATION_ID
fields.description: Location id where a department is located. Foreign key to location_id column of locations table.
